website_summaries.verdict: A good filter-free model with a 4 liter tank, but a noisier and brighter design than some others – best used out of the bedroom.
pros: The mist direction and output level are adjustable
The 4 liter tank can humidify for up to 40 hours on low
The filter-free design means no expensive refills or extra surfaces for bacteria to grow
cons: Condensation may accumulate around the base, and cleaning may be a challenge
The bright nightlight can't be turned off, impeding sleep for some owners using this by the bed

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The blue light is nice at night
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a week. So far so good. The blue light is nice at night, makes it easier to see water level. I have it in a very large room and raises the humidity pretty good. I have hard well water, a lot of lime in it. Be too expensive to buy water for it so every couple of days I had a shot glass of lemon juice and have no problems. I use a sink sprayer to clean the bottom and rinse out the top and it hasn't gotten icky. I keep it on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Mildew build-up
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier produces a lot of mist. It is easy to refill and operate. However, after just two months I can see mildew buildup inside the water tank. This is the first time I have purchased a cold mist vs. a hot mist humidifier for just this reason. I just cleaned the tank with a bleach wash but can still see mildew inside some of the parts. If you should purchase this, assume it is for one season. I will go back to the hot mist humidifiers next year.
customer_reviews.author: KSCK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier! Here in NE everything has to come in off the deck for the long winter. And use of the dry pellet stove begins. This humidifier is so much more effective than what I have been using. The true test will come when we are running the pellet stove 24-7. I love orchids and they don't like the dry air so much. They are very happy, as am I! It runs all night and I can easily vary the density of the mist. It is just fabulous. I confess I was a little leary because the price was more than I am used to, but it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: pilotma

customer_reviews.title: Overall very happy with unit.
customer_reviews.text: You'll notice some low level hissing but nothing annoying unless you're very picky. We like the two level light as it helps in the middle of the night if you need to get up and don't want to turn on the bright room lights. Even on the highest volume setting the tank holds more than enough water for close to 12 hours of use. Easy to clean. The port on top offers some directional flow of mist. Very happy with unit.
customer_reviews.author: W. B. Sage

customer_reviews.title: Was one of the best; for approximately 20 days :/
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing at first. However, within 20 days the dial that controls the motor in which the rate that blows out the air/water completely stopped working (causing the water vapor to build up and essentially rise out of the top without the power of the blower to force out the vapor at any speed). I used it for about 3 hours a day for 20 days before this issue. Loved it up until the blower motor stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier for kids
customer_reviews.text: It was a great humidifier, but if you get lazy with the daily cleaning of it this will stop working. Also can't use aroma oils. This would be great for a kids room though! Since it's adjustable and has variation of lights. Also the sound it makes is more like a white noise that would help my toddler fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Rivera family

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two weeks, ordered another one, broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a couple weeks of getting it. Prior to breaking I was very pleased with the overall function and quality. Thankfully, the return process has been very simple and my replacement has already been shipped. Here’s hoping the second one does not break so quickly. Edited to add, the second one broke within a few weeks but after the return window. Very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Running

customer_reviews.title: It does the job. With this machine I get the humidity I need.
customer_reviews.text: It's working great. I move it to the room I'm going to be in for awhile. My home is very tight and is very dry even if wet outside, but this humidifier does the job. The one problem is that I sometimes have to restart it after moving it. For some reason it'll work but no mist comes out until I restart it, pull the top off, pour the water in the bottom part away, and put the top back on.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Schoenberg

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even deserve one star! Poor quality plastic and the cap for the water tank just fell off after just 2 hours of use. Never realized plastic could be so brittle. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nimit

customer_reviews.title: HQ Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 6 months now so far and it's still going strong. This puts a very good amount of vapor in a room quickly, and I love that it has a dial, to allow you to adjust the vapor level at every increment. Lastly it also has a sizable tank, it's very easy to fill and carry, and once you fill it up, it will run all day and night on the lower settings.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. The steam that comes out can be adjusted on the front dial for how much and on the too for what direction the steam should go. The front also has a touch button for a blue light to light up the tank. Large tank for water and comes with a small brush for cleaning around rubber fittings. No filter needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice soothing product.
customer_reviews.text: It started out very quiet then got louder quickly, it’s not so loud that it disturbs me, it was just noticeable. I cleaned it and it still was louder than when it first started. Also the mist doesn’t last as long as it says on low, but it does last at least 12-14 hours. The blue night light is so soothing to me.
customer_reviews.author: The Paulson’s

customer_reviews.title: Quickly stops working properly. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: After my second refill it produces next to no vapor after each refill. This is after cleaning it and letting it dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: How to clean inside
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that is dark spotting on the inside of the unit. In a place that I am unable to clean. Wondering what that is from and how to clean it. Otherwise I like this unit
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier, the filling process is just a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Great humidifier, the filling process is just a little bit clunky and it seems like it leaks a little bit as it is removed from the base. Works very well, I'd reccomend that the dial is set lower. The first night I used this I set it to max flow and I woke up covered in cold water like an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great if you use filtered or distilled water.
customer_reviews.text: Works Great if you use filtered or distilled water. If you don't you will have white dust all over your house and on the furnace filter.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item, the sellers are amazing to work with. This humidifier works perfect, it's quiet, it's described accurately. My mom has copd and her quality of life has improved quite a bit with this little machine. I'd recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Humidifier EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have humidifiers in almost every room of my condo. Because it is so DRY here in Nevada I feel it is necessary to hydrate my home. I have tried many different COOL mist humidifiers and this by far IS the best on the market. No filters and super easyto clean. AND the output is amazing. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: It works if it doesn't break
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as advertised except for the fact that my 2nd one quit building smoke/heating 6 months after I got it. Contacted cust svc but no1 responded.
customer_reviews.author: Chekm8

customer_reviews.title: Fan Motor area got super hot then it stopped completely less than 48 hours after receipt
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working completely after less than 2 days. Used less than 12 hours total
customer_reviews.author: Susan G

customer_reviews.title: This is the standard!
customer_reviews.text: It’s powerful, quiet, small, and lasts a long time!! It’s great don’t get a cheaper/smaller one they need refilling too offen.
customer_reviews.author: Nihli

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after just a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours trying to find a good humidifier recently and settled on this one because of the glowing reviews. I might have been one of them if the thing didn't stop working after just a few hours of use. Don't waste your money or your time with this.
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Anne Thrope

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Saved my life
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Saved my life.. okay exaggerating but it really helped as got viral chest infection and dry heat in 20Deg outside was killing me.. works quietly and efficiently.. love to the cubical design.. long lasting tank for medium hydration, easy to use..
customer_reviews.author: Ayaz Khan

customer_reviews.title: Dont like how you cannot modify or add top filling cap ...
customer_reviews.text: Dont like how you cannot modify or add top filling cap easily .. not that great. Poor light control made me black out the light permanently .. stupid design
customer_reviews.author: joe444

customer_reviews.title: instant cool mist.
customer_reviews.text: Right on time..instant cool mist.. Really quiet..i do not hear this thing. Put it on desk next to our Eden Pure Infrared Heater.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ ACORD

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Quiet, no filter!
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced a Honeywell unit that had a filter, much quieter and easy to refill! Very quiet operation, directional mist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked promissing, loved the shape - but this one was unfortunately defect on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Looked good from packaging and I also liked the shape factor - was the reason I ordered this model - don't like the bulky round monsters that don't make use of space. Unfortunately this one was not working on arrival - it produced vapor mist, but didn't expel it as the fan was not working. Went back without ever been in use - I wish it would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Georg R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good experience
customer_reviews.text: Can a say anything bad about this product works well.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Strother

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you're getting what your looking  for
customer_reviews.text: Loved the night light but cool mist isn't what we needed
customer_reviews.author: linda j

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier in June and have used it 24/7 since. Very reliable and super easy to use. Compact size, easy to fill, easy to clean and great output. I will look for InvisiPure Products when shopping for my humidifier/dehumidifier needs from now on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Day

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to use . This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jose m alexandre

customer_reviews.title: you must buy this, it works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier. Easy to use, fill and clean. Very little noise, which is from the water gurgling. It also has a nice blue night light. I get dry mouth, I usually need to suck on a cough drops. Not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: I really like mine. It does the job and I'm glad ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier because our house is dry. I would get up from the couch and touch a metal object and get shocked from the dryness. I set this humidifier on my bar and no more shock. To those of you who had problems I can only say,I really like mine. It does the job and I'm glad I bought it. It is very quiet except when the water level changes and that doesnt bother me. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Newman

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first and it is truly whisper quiet
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first and it is truly whisper quiet. Then, 2 nights ago we went to bed with it working fine. We woke up and it wasn't working and hasn't since. Very disappointed. When it worked it was awesome. Only had it a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good price, great quality, not loud. I have had it for just over a year now and it's been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much that I ordered another one for ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much that I ordered another one for another room. It's quite, nice looking and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Annette & Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: The best humidifiers I own.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best humidifiers available. I own this version and the smaller one. Almost completely quiet. I really like the dial to determine the moisture output. Big tank that I only have to refill one every two to three days on my settings that are pretty high. Definitely worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one
customer_reviews.text: The first unit works so well that I purchased another. I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Soothing cool mist while asleep
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our Master Bedroom. One filling lasted 5 days. I only needed it at night while asleep. I no longer get dry throat when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Barn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, till now. UPDATE: 2ND ONE QUIT ALSO. THESE SHOULD HAVE A LONGER LIFE.
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and 2 months and it stopped working, it was great while it lasted, have a cheaper one beside it over 3 years old and still going. you choose. UPDATE. REPLACED IN NOVEMBER 2019. NO LONGER WORKS. JUST STOPPED LIKE THE LAST ONE.
customer_reviews.author: FRED

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, love these humidifiers. . They hold lots of water and you only have to fill once a day. Easy to adjust the settings . Plus my kids love the night light feature.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thiele

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: With this humidifier, I sleep better and I do not wake up with a dry nose and mouth. It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it holds so much water and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it holds so much water and I don't have to refill it often and it's lightweight. I recommend it to anyone who needs a humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We are using it in the cold Colorado mountains, where the humidity is low and home heating dries the air even more. Since getting this humidifier, skin is less dry, and we've had no bloody noses. We love it--quiet, compact and efficient!
customer_reviews.author: Alison F. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet. The large capacity is great. I’ll purchase for other areas too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well able to control strength of mist from light to heavy. Holds a gallon of distilled water. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: LPM

customer_reviews.title: Best portable humidifier I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. I highly recommend it. I use it in the bedroom at night. Has helped my allergies and it is so quiet you don't hear it run. Love the night light it has too.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Height

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and quiet but every 10 minutes, it makes a short slurping sound.
customer_reviews.author: D. Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Only LOOKS like a humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how a humidifier can shoot out vapors and never change the humidity in a tiny room, but if that’s the feature you’re looking for, this is the humidifier for you! CRAP!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but would be nice if there was a way to fill it from the top.
customer_reviews.author: B. Painter

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I used this humidifer for amlost a year now., 6 months in it stops working it no longer makes mist. i contacted customer service they sent a replacement and the replacement has also stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Dariona lewis

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small indoor grow tent. Works perfectly with a timer.

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Only had for about a week. 2nd time using it and it’s not working. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Karie O’Neill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this humidifier! Quiet running and water flow level is great to have. Easy to refill.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in our 12 x 12 bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our 12 x 12 bedroom. Tank of water lasts 3 - 4 days. Night light is nice with its 2 settings, but a bit bright for us as adults. Night light would be great for kids. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item with a beautiful shape. Water does leak a big after filling, but nothing uncontrollably difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Westi

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best humidifier ever!!!! Easy to clean and fill. Live the auto shutoff!
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: It's incredibly compact for its water capacity and whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.text: So far a fantastic little humidifier! I can't believe how compact it is and it's so quiet! Great purchase for the money and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has a very neat light
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has a very neat light. Easy to fill and it's very easy to fit on a night stand or anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: This broke after 1 week of use. Now I ...
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 1 week of use. Now I have to pay the postage to send this expensive door stop back.
customer_reviews.author: ronald p gruett

customer_reviews.title: Excellant product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product. Will buy it again if I need another. will refer to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: I love that it holds more water than most humidifiers and ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this every night. I wouldn't be able to sleep without it. I love that it holds more water than most humidifiers and I don't have to refill it every night. For those that stuggle during the winter months- this is a guaranteed relief.
customer_reviews.author: Team LA Family

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a large bedroom like we have
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but I wish it were larger. I don't think it would work as a full house humidifier as advertised. Very good for a large bedroom like we have.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie URbanic

customer_reviews.title: Since having this in my bedroom during the dry winter ...
customer_reviews.text: Since having this in my bedroom during the dry winter days it has helped with dryness and I have not woken up stuffy or feeling hungover. It's quiet, compact and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Luchsinger

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean high capacity room humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quiet, easy to clean high capacity room humidifier. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoodoo Man

customer_reviews.title: So far I am pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with this. I have it in our bedroom. I had been having severe nose bleeds requiring trips to ER. Hoping this will be an answer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No filter!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the humidifier doesn’t use a filter. It has definitely raised the humidity in the house and that’s what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well satisfied with the simplicity and its efficiency,also like the design .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great unit. Only wish it had a little bigger tank.
customer_reviews.author: dooner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, long running time with a tank of water, extra fine mist!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry E Fairfield

customer_reviews.title: We love it! It is incredibly quiet even at the ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It is incredibly quiet even at the highest output setting. Keep on mind it is only good for a few hundred square feet...if you have a 2 story house, you'll need 2.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been exactly what was advertised; I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Variable Output
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with this humidifier. Easy to fill, runs all day and night. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: Worst humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Awful. They went me a used humidifier. Never again I’ll be ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail  Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier works!
customer_reviews.text: We use it at night in our bedroom. Keeps nose from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd R Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's quiet, efficient and has been a godsend to my dry sinuses this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Seeking more real music

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great compact design, quiet and delivers tons of humidity just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Features are as promised
customer_reviews.text: Silent, multiple controls for level of humidity, water lasts longer and auto shut off when water is low are all the great features I was looking for and it delivers as expected. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ensamya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated and I love the design. We are going to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it ran fine. The second night
customer_reviews.text: The first night, it ran fine. The second night, it quit running in the middle of the night, and the water from the reservoir leaked all over the floor and into the inside of the wall. I have a mold allergy, so we'll need to contact a cleaning company to clean up the moisture inside the wall. Very upset and disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bobkat49

customer_reviews.title: It is quiet and beautiful. I bought two and one is exquisite
customer_reviews.text: It is quiet and beautiful. I bought two and one is exquisite. Used them identically but one died a painful death after 4 weeks. The company wants it back obviously to peruse the problem. Unfortunately they don't pay for shipping on defective material. They would pay to ship me a new one if they determined the machine is at fault. I chose not to invest in shipping and risk having them say somehow it was not the fault of the machine. It is a beautiful machine but not worth double the price to have one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine at a terrific price.
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet. No more sore throat in the morning. No moisture residue. It's terrific. In fact, it works so great we bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Nona C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: so needless to say I'm not real happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We,couldn't get it to come on, so needless to say I'm not real happy with it. But if it doesn't come on then it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: enjoys reading

customer_reviews.title: 50 for crap
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money u pay for it for to Walmart buy a cheap one it's better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great humidifier with nice shape and no noise. Every aspect is perfect I think! And sure I will recommend it! The only thing that makes me feel a little unhappy is the carrier just drop the item on the first floor of our building, without my signature, without any notification, just throwed it on the floor. Our building does not have doorman but have parcel pending box for delivery. Anyway, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Butterlion

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it again. Much smaller than I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy it again. Much smaller than I realized it would be. Small tank--all the water is used up before the night is over (I use it at night in my bedroom).
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore student

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet. Great output. Only problem is cleaning it. Even with filtered water, that pink slime builds up between the plastic pieces where the output direction thing is-then it turns to mold. Have to remove with a verrrry long screwdriver and bleach it.
customer_reviews.author: McKJam

customer_reviews.title: White DUST! Vinegar killed it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use in bedrooms and they worked OK, filling the room with Bay Area-like fog every night. Here's the problem: *sticky WHITE DUST EVERYWHERE*. I have a water refiner that uses ion exchange. The white dust turned out to be minerals left over from the vaporizing. The machine got a bit noisier too. So, I poured vinegar into the tank and ran that. That killed both units. When I opened them up, there was extensive rusting on the components and pcbs. So, cautionary tale: USE DE-IONIZED WATER and don't put anything but water in these.
customer_reviews.author: Bires

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Simple, Well Designed Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to operate, excellent design, integrated carrying handle, works very well on any setting. I've been using this for over a year now and it is a rock solid humidifier. I would buy it again, and recommend it. I just reviewed another humidifier I bought at the same time on amazon.com, different manufacturer, that is equally awesome, but more money, with a build in humidity sensor/ readout and 50% larger water reservoir, but for more money. This InvisiPure Sky Humidifier is perfect for our bedroom and will run ~16 hours at 50% on one fill.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The unit is quiet and the light can be turned off. I had a loud fan after 2 weeks, emailed the company and they quickly replaced it! The square design makes it very east to place on the base as opposed to round where it is hard to place (have one of them). The flat top allows the refilling of water as it sits flat in the sink. Best one we ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different humidifiers this season. This one I use in living room because it can be used in large rooms. Really like the handle because it's built into top for easy carrying. It has a beautiful night light and it's fun to watch the cool mist. I would only but this one if I had to do it over again.
customer_reviews.author: surfer CA girl

customer_reviews.title: Mold issues, difficult to clean! Ultrasonic head peeling paint now!
customer_reviews.text: Grows the pink/orange slimy mold quickly, even with Protecs ball and difficult to clean, even with included brush. Places you just can't get to! Using distilled water to avoid mold issue now. Other than that MAJOR issue, it's quiet with high output. UPDATE: 4 1/2 months later and ultrasonic head scaling off paint? Reminds me of lead rotting from under paint on fishing lures. I hope it isn't lead! Photos included.
customer_reviews.author: Little Buddha

customer_reviews.title: A Humid Performance...
customer_reviews.text: After one-week of use I can say that i truly like this product. Early reviews on the product are quite accurate and fair. The humidifier effect is very good. The water tank is of adequate size to last a long day (or more, depending on use). The design of the tank does not permit easy viewing of the water level but this is very minor. Auto shut-off works fine. The size and shape are unique and easily found a good spot in my office. Whisper quiet as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: nk

customer_reviews.title: Great Himidifier at a Fair Price.
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier has worked exactly the way I expected and hoped for. It's quiet, easy to refill the reservoir wit water, easy to change the direction of the mist. It also allows for slow to high release of the mist. I have been using it every night when I am not traveling as it has helped me sleep better and keep my room from getting too dry. I would recommend this humidifier to anyone who is looking for an efficient and quiet humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Jabbour

customer_reviews.title: very good humidifier, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: very good humidifier, very quiet, the only thing I do not like is that the electric cord is attached to the body, you will have to unplug the cord from the power outlet and take the body with the cord to clean it. unlike other more expensive models where you may remove the cord from the body and never touch the power outlet with your wet hands. just like the laptop cord. But the price is good and fair.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Too good to last.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this unit, for two months. I used this daily and kept if filled and clean. All was great. We have had wet weather and then warmer weather so I left if off for 5 days. When I filled the tank and turned it on...NOTHING! I cleaned it, and refilled it and still no green light! Checking to see what kind of warranty after Amazon's 30 days. What a shame. Reading reviews I see this is a somewhat common issue. Dern it. Too Good to last.
customer_reviews.author: juliann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Despite scrubbing the bottom between fills and using a demineralizing product the unit only worked about 10 times. You could see the mist but it wouldn't come out of the unit. I cleaned it multiple times and decided to get a refund. Maybe if I'd used distilled water but never had that many issues with my other humidifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy user
customer_reviews.text: and I would recommend this to anyone looking to purchase one. Its easy to fill and very quiet. The 2 level nightlight is a nice feature as well. Only thing I am disappointed with is that it is shown as being bought with a fish to help keep the tank clean.....the fish will NOT fit into the opening of the tank, so don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective unit
customer_reviews.text: The unit is stylish, very quiet and produces a high volume of humidified air. I would prefer a larger water tank for extended usage but this would be balanced against the point that the smaller unit can fit unobtrusively on a small table. The unit also doesn't have a humidistat.
customer_reviews.author: Turning Man Fred

customer_reviews.title: I've had them for a month and one of them works great, the other does not
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these humidifiers. I've had them for a month and one of them works great, the other does not. The one that doesn't work well produces a very low amount of mist on the highest setting. I've cleaned it several times per the manual instructions and it has not helped the mist output at all. I have to run the humidifier on the highest setting to get any mist at all. On halfway or low there is no mist at all.
customer_reviews.author: SLW

product_meta.title: InvisiPure Sky Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier – Whisper Quiet for Baby and Large Bedrooms, High Mist Output, Filter Free, Automatic Shut-Off, Night Light, BPA Free, 1 Gallon Lasts 40 Hours
feature_bullets: GREAT PERFORMANCE. Uses Japanese made motor for improved mist height up to 2 feet compared to 1 ft or less of other brands. Very quiet operation. Great for light sleepers and kids.

EASY TO USE. 360 degree adjustable mist nozzle and one knob control to adjust mist output. Dual mode night light that can be turned off while the humidifier is running. Automatic shutoff when the water level is low or the tank is removed.

LARGE TANK. 1 gallon tank will last up to 40 hours on the lowest setting compared to 12 hours of other brands. Compact design can fit in any size room. The humidifier measures 6.7 x 6.7 x 11.2 inches. Note: Do not use essential oils or additives as this can damage the humidifier. It is only meant to hold water only.

HEALTH BENEFITS. Ultrasonic cool mist humidifier design moisturizes the air for up to 40 hours. The water tank is 1 gallon compared to 1 - 2 Liter tanks that only last a few hours. Benefits from using the ultrasonic humidifier include the following: Relieves dry coughing, nasal congestion, and other symptoms of colds and allergies. Prevents nosebleeds, irritated vocal cords, and chapped lips. Promotes softer, more vibrant skin. Reduces static electricity shocks.
SAFETY TESTED. The humidifier is BPA FREE. Safety tested by a lab for electrical and materials and certified by ROHS, CE, and ETL. 1 year warranty is included and lifetime customer service support.
